original: 東吳後期大官。史書上記載不多，曾奉權臣孫綝命令，迎孫亮為帝。又得吳末帝孫皓寵信，任中書令，後又升任司徒。
text: The late Soochow officials. There are not many records in the history books, and he was once ordered by the power official Sun Wei to welcome Sun Liang as the emperor. He was also favored by the Emperor of Wu, Sun Hao, and served as the commander of Zhongshu, and then promoted to Situ.
